title: It's Patch 5.6
body:
And people are still building Rangers Trailblazer on Warwick.

Why.
WHY.
**WHY?!**

There is NO point. Nope. 0. Period. "I want to solo dragon early" -- WW can do this with no buffs and just AD runes and AS quints at level ONE. "buh raptor clear" you don't take damage in the jungle as warwick. At all.

At level 1, I start gromp, then blue, then wolves, then raptors, THEN red, then golems, then walk all the way back to gromp, do the entire jungle again and by then whatever hp i lost between levels 2-4 is already gained back by the level 5. And I don't use potions. I buy a machete + green. He doesn't run oom that early on in the game. If he does, stop spamming Q every time it's off CD and use it only to regain your lost health.

So please. Stop building rangers. It's shit on him. Hell, Poacher's is better.

replies.body:
You do realize Trailblazer is not only good for sustain right?

It is often picked up on champions who lack AoE waveclear (ww)

Is probably better than skirmishers now in most situations.

Skirmishers is best on champions who A: Have good sticking power and want to duel (Xin), or B : Want to sit on top of the enemy adc while taking no damage (Nunu)

> [{quoted}](name=Cameron2325,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qrveq0pQ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-04-02T23:49:16.684+0000)
>
> You do realize Trailblazer is not only good for sustain right?
> 
> It is often picked up on champions who lack AoE waveclear (ww)
> 
> Is probably better than skirmishers now in most situations.
> 
> Skirmishers is best on champions who A: Have good sticking power and want to duel (Xin), or B : Want to sit on top of the enemy adc while taking no damage (Nunu)

> [{quoted}](name=Devi Freak Mint,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Qrveq0pQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-02T19:35:41.924+0000)
>
> Don't you get Ranger's Trailblazer on Warwick to make up for his relatively slow clear speed?

No, I actually don't. Warwick is a late game champion. His very DEFINITION and EXISTANCE is 0% existance pre-6 EXCEPT in his own jungle which he completely dominates (very hard to counter WW because camps are rarely up). While it's possible to gank pre-6 with an E it rarely happens is more opportunistic than planned. 

Since he's a mid-game cc bot and a late-game God, rangers is uselss because by the time you get done with your Bork/Wit's end + devourer the .1 second you save to kill raptors doesn't help as much as a good skirmisher's would against the enemy ADC/mid laner (top maybe). The pick potential with skirmisher's is absolutely absurd as well. You combine it with red buff and you get a more powerful "ignite" than the actual spell.

Switching it out isn't viable either since you will get to level 6 about the same time regardless--by the time you're STARTING the buff you started the game off, so around 7:30.
It's a great pick for many champs including him. Plus most grab it early on and switch it out.
You get rangers because while he clears well, he also clears slow.

AoE clear for the fastest 6 possible.

I'd be more afraid if a ww took poachers.

I thought you got Trailblazer to speed up his clears and sustain yourself throughout the rest of the match.  The HP and Mana gained from using it on monsters is very helpful, especially when you have a large HP pool to use and combined with Blue Buff and Red Buff make for a fantastic quick heal if you're ever sieging and you just need a little bit more.
With rangers your ult does a lot more damage.
Don't you get Ranger's Trailblazer on Warwick to make up for his relatively slow clear speed?
